function.description:
Receives a list, object or string value 'list' and a delimiter which defaults to an empty string.
In case list is a string it returns the string. Else it joins the string content with the provided delimiter.

example.title: Usage
example.code: String.join(["a", "b", "c"]); // Result: abc String.join(["a", "b", "c"], "_"); // Result: a_b_c
